body: While all ghouls are quiet and deadly in the night, these ghouls specialize in striking from cover or exploiting tactical advantages. They set up ambushes or fight using group tactics to claim their prey.
name: Sneaky Ghouls

sections.special_attacks: disease (DC 14), paralysis (1d4+1 rounds, DC 14, elves are immune to this effect), sneak attack +2d6
sections.melee: bite +7 (1d6+3 plus disease and paralysis), 2 claws +7 (1d6+3 plus paralysis)
sections.other_gear: leather armor, mwk light crossbow with 20 arrows, 204 gp
sections.feats: Bag of Bones*, Power Attack, Weapon Finesse
sections.name: Ghoul Creeper
sections.skills: Acrobatics +12, Bluff +11, Climb +11, Disable Device +5, Escape Artist +17, Intimidate +11, Perception +11, Sleight of Hand +12, Stealth +12
sections.combat_gear: potion of greater magic fang, potion of inflict moderate wounds, tanglefoot bag

sections.special_attacks: disease (DC 14), paralysis (1d4+1 rounds, DC 14, elves are immune to this effect), sneak attack +3d6
sections.melee: bite +8 (1d6+3 plus disease and paralysis), 2 claws +8 (1d6+3 plus paralysis)
sections.other_gear: +1 composite shortbow with 20 arrows, bracers of armor +1, 62 gp
sections.feats: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Rapid Shot, Toughness, Weapon Focus (composite shortbow)
sections.defensive_abilities: channel resistance +2, evasion, trap sense +2, uncanny dodge
sections.special_qualities: rogue talents (finesse rogue, ledge walker, weapon training), trapfinding +3
sections.name: Ghoul Stalker
sections.skills: Acrobatics +16, Bluff +10, Climb +14, Disable Device +8, Escape Artist +16, Intimidate +10, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +12, Perception +14, Sense Motive +14, Stealth +16
